description:
Attorney Michael J. Sabbeth founded our Woodstock law firm, Sabbeth Law Office, armed with a determination to help injured victims and families in Windsor County and the surrounding areas in Vermont to obtain the maximum compensation available. Today, his dedication to our clients continues, and he has built a reputation as one of the state's most tenacious legal advocates by assisting clients with personal injury cases related to the following:

  • Car, truck and motorcycle accidents
  • Pedestrian accidents
  • Medical malpractice
  • Products and premises liability
  • Wrongful death

In addition to representing victims of personal injuries and losses, we also offer representation, guidance and support to victims of workplace accidents. We know how difficult it can be to obtain workers' compensation, and we will remain at your side throughout the claims process.

Whether you suffered an injury in an accident, lost a loved one due to another's negligence or sustained an on-the-job injury, you can put your trust in the capable hands of the attorney at our law firm, Sabbeth Law Office. If you would like to discuss your situation with our lawyer, you can do so by taking advantage of our offer for a free initial consultation at our law office in Woodstock.
